get.summary: List out all space with booking rule

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of page to use (user/dept), only for admin

contactRequired.title: 1:Require contact with admin beforehand, 0: No need

openForStaff.title: 0:Staff not allow to book 1:Staff allow to book

openForStudent.title: 0:Student not allow to book 1:Student allow to book

bookingMode.title: 0: Free time selection, 1: Limited to preset slots

startTime.title: Start time in a day when booking is allow,range: (0,24)

endTime.title: End time in a day when booking is allow,range: (0,24)

maxUserDailyBooking.title: Maximum booking number allow for each user in a day (0 mean no restrict)

maxUserDailyBookingHour.title: Maximum booking hour allow for each user in a day (0 mean no restrict)

startTime.title: Start time of booking in a day

endTime.title: End time of booking in a day

adminId.title: Admin that approve/reject, user will contact this admin rather manager if umpoint.booking.space.find-approve-admin-first=true

event.title: Description of the event or purpose for the booking

startTime.title: Start time of booking in a day

endTime.title: End time of booking in a day

space.title: Name of space that being booked

admin.title: Name of admin who approve/reject booking

username.title: Name of user who make booking

openForStaff.title: 0:Staff not allow to book 1:Staff allow to book

openForStudent.title: 0:Student not allow to book 1:Student allow to book

adminId.title: Admin that approve/reject, user will contact this admin rather manager if umpoint.service.booking.find-approve-admin-first=true

service.title: Name of service that being booked

admin.title: Name of admin who approve/reject booking

username.title: Name of user who make booking

replyMessageId.title: Message ID that is responding to

reportedUserType.title: User Type for ID that being report

reportedBy.title: User ID that send this report

reportedByType.title: User Type for Id that send this report

reportedByUsername.title: Name of user that send this report

adminId.title: Admin that approve/reject, user will contact this admin rather manager if umpoint.booking.accommodation.find-approve-admin-first=true

event.title: Description of the event or purpose for the booking

space.title: Name of space that being booked

admin.title: Name of admin who approve/reject booking

username.title: Name of user who make booking

openForStaff.title: 0:Staff not allow to book 1:Staff allow to book

openForStudent.title: 0:Student not allow to book 1:Student allow to book

event.title: Description of the event or purpose for the booking

startTime.title: Start time of booking in a day

endTime.title: End time of booking in a day

technicianNumber.title: Number of additional technician(s) if required

event.title: Description of the event or purpose for the booking
